Class SQLiteSpecific

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.specific.impl.AbstractJdbcSpecific
      • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.specific.impl.SQLiteSpecific
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JdbcSpecific

    public class SQLiteSpecific
extends AbstractJdbcSpecific
    A JdbcSpecific for SQLite serverless database

        Overrides:

        queryType - Type of query
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - In can query cannot be generated or is otherwise invalid
